name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
storytext: Praise be unto the Abyss, the Wisdom of Corrosion.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

skills.name: Shock of the Enigmatic Abyss
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\nIf the target is already affected by Electro, steal 1 Energy from them. (If this character's Energy is already full, then the stolen Energy will be given to the next character who does not have full Energy)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\nIf the target is already affected by Electro, steal 1 Energy from them. (If this character's Energy is already full, then the stolen Energy will be given to the next character who does not have full Energy)
skills.description:
Deals 3 Electro DMG.
If the target is already affected by Electro, steal 1 Energy from them. (If this character's Energy is already full, then the stolen Energy will be given to the next character who does not have full Energy)

skills.name: Wild Thunderburst
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\nIf the target has no more than 1 Energy, deals +2 DMG.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\nIf the target has no more than 1 Energy, deals +2 DMG.
skills.description:
Deals 3 Electro DMG.
If the target has no more than 1 Energy, deals +2 DMG.
